title: Natural gas prices for households in Germany 2010 - 2018 , semi-annually
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Euro cents per kilowatt-hour, with a total of 17 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018_S1 to 2015_S2.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2012_S1 to 2010_S1.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2013_S2 to 2012_S1.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2015_S2 to 2014_S2.
But, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2014_S2 to 2013_S2.
gold: This statistic shows the natural gas prices for household end users in Germany semi-annually from 2010 to 2018 . In the first half of 2018 , the average natural gas price for households was 6.08 euro cents per kWh .
